author: kpedro88
body:
#### PR description:

Supersedes #32083: rebased and with some minor adjustments based on https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/32083#issuecomment-754155277.

#### PR validation:

Ran SIM with and without `--procModifiers fineCalo`; observed expected additional content in output file when fineCalo enabled.
title: finecalo patches v1 (rebased)
